attributes.action: Give all children in social services care the support of a clinical Psychologist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All children who are taken into the care system by social services, have a formal range of assessment by a trained clinical psychologist. The effects of early truma on neurological development is well documented failing to diagnose mental health problems early.Make treatment more Specialised.The prison system has many inmates that have been through the care system. But lack of funding for mental health checks by trained Psychologists at a early stage, leaves many children traumatised and prone to aggressive and unpredictable behaviour.Unable to have a normal adult life. Drugs and alchol problems are common.The state welfare system is there only means of support. Implementing treatment plans early, would be a therapeutic support to all children taken into the care system.
Significant psychological and behavioural difficulties or symptoms should not be left to the assessment of social workers. Look In any young offenders prison or youth justice program, a high number of the young people within them, are from a social services care system background.
